definition: a noisy fight in a crowd, to quarrel noisily, angrily or disruptively
details:
noun
- a noisy fight in a crowd
= synonyms: free-for-all
- an uproarious party
= synonyms: do, bash
verb
- to quarrel noisily, angrily or disruptively
= example: to quarrel noisily, angrily or disruptively
= synonyms: wrangle
